Evolt Org Source Code To Be Released

24 Sep 1999

Evolt.org is happy to announce that we will begin distributing the source code that runs the evolt.org site free for download and under the GPL license.

\nBefore we give it to the masses, I'd like to ask if there are any CF developers out there that would like to get a sneak peak at the source by helping with documentation, bug fixing, etc. Nothing serious, just a once over from other people that develop CF.

\nAfter this short process is finished, we'll begin offering the source to the masses of fanatic groupies out there that have been lusting after it since inception...

\nTo those of you are that interested, please drop me a line! Thanks!
